topic: philippines evacuates 3,000 people after activity increases at mayon volcano

text: Breaking news is coming in from the Philippines
A massive evacuation effort is underway due to increased activity at Mayon Volcano
Thousands of people have been forced to flee their homes in a matter of hours
Over 3,000 people have been evacuated from the surrounding areas of Mayon Volcano

identity_keyword: Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology
text: The Philippine Institute of Volcanology and Seismology is closely monitoring the situation
The Philippine government has raised the alert level due to increased activity at Mayon Volcano
The increased activity has prompted authorities to take swift action to ensure public safety
The evacuees have been relocated to safe zones
They are being provided with food, shelter, and other essential supplies
The government is working to minimize disruption to daily life
And mitigate the risks associated with the volcanic activity
The situation remains uncertain as the investigation into the volcano's activity is ongoing
It remains to be seen whether the increased activity will lead to a full-scale eruption
Authorities are urging residents to remain vigilant and await further updates
